title: Specialized’s latest bikes for Unbound Gravel 2023 are inspired by their Technical Support Team
content:
Allison Tetrick, Matt Beers, and others will ride Specialized Diverge STR and Crux race bikes using the 1988 Support Team Livery.

Read the full article at Specialized’s latest bikes for Unbound Gravel 2023 are inspired by their Technical Support Team on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
